3rd Time Unlucky

+50% Weapon DMG. Obtain 1 Cursed Scroll for every 3 Mysterious Chests you opened. (Cannot be discarded)
Enhanced ( 80?): +50% Weapon DMG. Obtain 1 Occult Scroll for every 3 Peculiar Chests you opened. (Cannot be discarded)

Rarity

Normal

Unlock

Kill Elite Kappa 1 time.

Abnormal Speed

+3% Movement Speed for every 10% Shield/Armor you currently have.
Enhanced ( 20?): +5% Movement Speed for every 10% total HP you currently have.

Rarity

Normal

Unlock

Unlocked by default.

Absolute Advantage

Hero

Qing Yan - Fatal Wings

Effect

Increases Cleave AoE, and increases Cleave DMG for every enemy within the range.

Lv.1

AoE +2m, +20% Cleave DMG.

Lv.2

AoE +3m, +30% Cleave DMG.

Lv.3

AoE +5m, +40% Cleave DMG.

Abundant Vitality

+75% total Weapon DMG while Shield/Armor is recovering. +75% total DMG for the next shot when Shield/Armor is fully recovered.
Enhanced ( 100?): +75% total Weapon DMG while Shield/Armor is recovering, and Shield recovery won't be interrupted. +75% total DMG for the next shot when Shield/Armor is fully recovered.

Rarity

Normal

Unlock

Unlocked by default.

Accurate Crush

Hero

Li - Ashes

Effect

Increases DMG when Blazing Meteor hit only 1 enemy.

Lv.1

Deal 200% DMG.

Lv.2

Deal 200% DMG. 50% chance for 300% DMG.

Lv.3

Deal 300% DMG. 20% chance for 400% DMG.

Acidic Explosion

Hero

Crown Prince - Smoke

Effect

Enemies affected by your grenades become volatile and will explode after being defeated.

Acidominance

Hero

Crown Prince - Element

Effect

Increases Corrosion DMG.

Lv.1

+40% Corrosion DMG.

Lv.2

+80% Corrosion DMG.

Lv.3

+120% Corrosion DMG, and a crit hit will create a toxic cloud equivalent to a detonated smoke grenade (Each enemy triggers at most once every 3s).

Adrenal Rush

Hero

Ao Bai - Veteran

Effect

Increase DMG Resistance and recover HP per second after killing an enemy or destroying an item.

Lv.1

+10% DMG Resistance and +1% HP/s for 6s.

Lv.2

+15% DMG Resistance and +1.5% HP/s for 6s.

Lv.3

+20% DMG Resistance and +2% HP/s for 20s.

Advanced Depot

Use reserve ammo first rather than magazine when shooting. There is a 50% chance to consume double ammo.
Enhanced ( 100?): Use reserve ammo first rather than magazine when shooting.

Rarity

Legendary

Unlock

Kill Lu Wu 2 times on elite or higher difficulty.

-50% Dash cooldown.
Enhanced ( 60?): -50% Dash cooldown, and has a 33% chance to reset Dash cooldown while using it.

Normal

Unlock

Advanced Shield

Hero

Crown Prince - Orb

Effect

Increases Shield Recharge Rate and decreases Shield Recharge Delay after casting Energy Orbs.

Lv.1

+60% Shield recharge rate and -60% Shield recharge delay, and Shield recovery won't be interrupted for 6s.

Against the Flow

Recover 15% ammo to the magazine every second for 4s after dealing DMG to an enemy. When the effect ends, instead lose 1 random type ammo from reserves every second.
Enhanced ( 60?): Recover 15% ammo to the magazine every second for 4s after dealing DMG to an enemy.

Rarity

Normal

Unlock

Unlocked by default.

Airbag

-4% HP per second when your Shield/Armor is full. Recover 100% HP and negate excess DMG when your Shield/Armor gets fully broken.
Enhanced ( 80?): -4% HP per second when your Shield/Armor is more than 0. Recover 100% HP and negate excess DMG when your Shield/Armor gets broken.

Rarity

Legendary

Unlock

Kill Yoruhime-Maru 3 times on elite or higher difficulty.

Ammo Expert

Hero

Ao Bai - Gunfire

Effect

Recover ammo every second. While Dual-Wielding, the amount of ammo recovered doubles, and there is a chance to consume no ammo.

Lv.1

Recover 5 ammo per second and have 20% chance to consume no ammo.

Lv.2

Recover 10 ammo per second and have 35% chance to consume no ammo.

Lv.3

Recover 15 ammo per second and have 50% chance to consume no ammo.

Ammo Extractor

Hero

Tao - Mainstay Weapon

Effect

Restore a percentage of ammo in the magazine on each kill, and increase the Weapon DMG on subsequent shots based on the amount of recovered ammo (including the ammo that exceeded the magazine capacity).

Lv.1

Recovers 50% of ammo in magazine, +40% Weapon DMG.

Lv.2

Recovers 75% of ammo in magazine, +50% Weapon DMG.

Lv.3

Recovers 100% of ammo in magazine, +100% Weapon DMG.

Ammo Recoverer

Get 1 random ammo for every 1 meter traveled.
Enhanced ( 40?): Get 1 ammo of each weapon type for every 1m traveled.

Rarity

Normal

Unlock

Unlocked by default.

Amplified Sword

Hero

Tao - Blade Rain

Effect

The enemies hit by a flying sword will take more DMG from other flying swords for a short time (stackable).

Lv.1

The enemy takes +4% DMG from flying swords within 1s.

Lv.2

The enemy takes +7% DMG from flying swords within 1s.

Lv.3

The enemy takes +10% DMG from flying swords within 1.5s.
